newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: W/Horton sees pick-up in activity.
newsitem.headline: W/Horton sees pick-up in activity.

text.p: New Zealand publisher Wilson and Horton said on Thursday it was well positioned to benefit as business activity picked up.

"The directors have confidence in the inherent strength of the economy and believe that as business activity increases the group is well positioned to benefit," it said in a statement accompanying its interim result.
